column1: Has the founder completed an advanced degree in a relevant field?
Has the founder held a C-level role in a technology company?
Did the founder co-found their current company with a small team?
Has the founder previously worked full-time at a large number of companies?
Has the founder's previous startup experience included any acquisitions?
Does the founder have a background in the pharmaceutical or biopharmaceutical industries?
Has the founder received moderate press or media coverage?
Is the founder based in California?
Has the founder held leadership roles in multiple startups?
Does the founder have experience in financial services or banking?
